body_html:
No worries. So you need to use TF without GPU support as only with a compatible NVIDIA GPU one is able to use TF with GPU enabled support.
This issue can be closed now if there are no other questions.

body:
No worries. So you need to use TF without GPU support as only with a compatible NVIDIA GPU one is able to use TF with GPU enabled support. 
This issue can be closed now if there are no other questions.
